content:
READ ONE:

If you SAVED THE FESTIVAL:

You awake feeling refreshed, greeted by memories of the Blossom Festival and how you averted disaster. Thanks to you, more people will remember how delightful and merry the festival was, instead of how a cloudhive swarm nearly ruined it.

Each Ranger gains 1 additional energy of any type for the first round.

If BROOKSIDE INFESTED:

You wake in a fit, only to discover that your nightmare about being covered by a blanket of angry bees was just that: only a nightmare.

You hope that the people of Brookside stay safe now that they have a massive colony of cloudhive bees so near to their village.

Otherwise:

You pass by some travelers on the trail in the early hours of the day, and hear in passing that the Blossom Festival ended in ruin—apparently all of the floral decorations caught the attention of a massive cloudhive which now hovers ominously over the festival grounds in Brookside.

Complete each Festival mission.

Record BROOKSIDE INFESTED on your campaign tracker.
